name: Online Telemarketing I Lund Ab Reviews

review.title: “Pretty standard telemarketing company”
review.pros: Pros – Good chance to grind your cold calling skills up to a higher level
review.cons: Cons – I would have preferred the coaching to be more focused on what works and why rather than trying to fix the delivery of the pre-written pitch.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Educate low-lever staff more in selling techniques.

review.title: “Only if you need the money”
review.pros: Pros – Choose when you work (4 hour shifts, minimum 32 hours per month).Free, virtually unlimited supply of cookies, tea and coffee.You can make a pretty decent amount of money if you're good at it.Salary is paid weekly.Decent enough support from management when facing difficulties.
review.cons: Cons – Horrible minimum amount of money you are guaranteed.Extremely profit-driven, capitalistic working place (and company culture).Almost all the telemarketers disliked the company.Employees were once encouraged by management to explicitly lie to potential customers (telling them we've used a product with good results when we in fact hadn't).No union.Call lists that were faulty (
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Stop encouraging your telemarketers to lie to potential customers. If your credibility wasn't already so low, it might help.Raise the minimum amount of guaranteed money.
